name: Mental Math Ball Challenge
description:
In the game you train your mental math skills in a fun way by throwing balls at targets. Can you throw the balls accurately in the center while calculating the math tasks? Train and compete on a global stage to become worlds Nr. 1 math baller in the global leaderboard.

The math training game is part of an international research project which lets you also provide anonymous feedback after the first round of play to help improve learning games.
